tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from sore, inflammed, red, and bleeding gums. My gum linings and teeth surfaces were covered with hard calculus deposits and my mouth was a harbor for those troublesome bacteria, causing bad breath. My gums started to recede and became so tender that they used to bleed with any little exertion I did. I was in a precarious situation and had to take a step as early as possible. That's when I decided to visit Delhi Dental Studio and consult Dr. Surpreet Bhandari, having researched about her extensive expertise in periodontal treatments. In the first visit itself, I was convinced I had taken the right decision. She explained my problem thoroughly and informed me about the elaborate plan to cure my disease from its root. In 3 sittings, each a week apart, she progressively treated my condition, starting from scaling and advancing to deep gum cleaning combined with LASER powered contouring. At no point, it felt I was hastily dealt with, thanks to the proper pre-planned weekly appointments and that gave my gums enough time to heal. The equipments and machines were modern and the clinic was hygienic with sanitation in check. I am fully satisfied with my experience here and really wish I had found this gem of a clinic even earlier.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I've had gum treatment and flap surgery in Delhi Dental Studio. My dentist, Dr. Surpreet has been amazing throughout the process, providing expert care and guidance. I'm grateful  for their skill and dedication, as it has made a noticeable difference in my oral health. Cleanliness and safety is what I like the most about Delhi Dental Studio. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of gum treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been going to Delhi Dental Clinic for a year now because of my aligners treatment. And, every time I visit, I come home with a happy and satisfied face. 

Dr. Surpreet is really a brilliant doctor, whom my treatment is ongoing with, and she makes sure that I don‚Äôt face any issues or pain with the aligners.

Thank you Delhi Dental Clinic for a wonderful and painless dental experience!
